text: Lovely ambience in the evening. It was my first time visiting Hill2 wine connection with my wife, and we really enjoyed the experience. The food was tasty, and the pizza options were pretty decent. Surprised to see it quite lively even on a weekday!
It's been a while since I dined at The Wine Connection. I must say that the food quality is very good and consistent. Nice place to be at in the west. Service was good too.

There were few minor slip-ups but we had a very nice evening celebrating my father's birthday! The food we ordered were delicious and beautifully plated, and the servers who attended to us have been truly delightful.

I truly appreciate the attentiveness and cheerful attitude of the service staff. Despite the busy Saturday night with numerous walk-in customers, I saw them moving swiftly to serve everyone, answering ringing phones, and handling takeaways efficiently. They gave their best effort, and even the pizza servers were polite and tactful. Itâ€™s heartening to still experience such excellent service in Singapore. Kudos to the team
Excellent choice for wine lovers. The food options were great and tasty.  The ambience is just perfect for hangout.  No loud music.
